summary: WHILE DRIVING THE LEFT FRONT TIRE WOULD MAKE A LOUD NOISE, THUS DISTRACTING THE CONSUMER.  THE DEALER WAS BEEN NOTIFIED.    PH  THE RIGHT FRONT TIRE HAD A HIGH WHISTLE.  THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO FIX, STATING THAT THIS HAPPENS AFTER THE VEHICLE REACHES 20K MILES, AND GREASED THE AXLE(S).  THE LIGHT UNDERHOOD WAS INOPERATIVE.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE UNDERHOOD LIGHT, LAMP ASSEMBLY, (STOP), TAIL, AND TURN SIGNAL LIGHT UNDERHOOD.  THE OUTSIDE MIRRORS WOULD NOT STAY IN PLACE.  THE DEALER REPLACED BOTH MODULES PER BULLETIN 02-08-64-027/BOTH SIDE MIRROR ACTUATORS.  SCC
